name: Name the Hollywood Director Quiz | Name The Director | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who directed "A League Of Their Own"?
questions.explanation:
Penny Marshall.

	Penny directed this big league hit starring Tom Hanks Madonna and Geena Davis.

James Cameron.

	Cameron won an oscar for directing this box office smash.

Wes Craven.

	Craven totally reinvented the horror movie for the '90s with this hit film. He also directed "A Nightmare On Elm Street".

Steven Spielberg.

	One of many big hits directed by Mr Spielberg, who won an Oscar for "Schindler's List".

John Carpenter.

	Jamie Lee Curtis became the scream queen of the '70s with an appearance in this and other horror films.

Tim Burton.

	Burton directed the first two movies in this series and then passed the chair to Shumacher.

Warren Beatty.

	Although they all starred in it, it was Beatty directing.

Kevin Costner.

	Costner also starred and won the Best Director Oscar for this one.

Garry Marshall.

	Marshall directed both box-office hits starring Julia Roberts and Richard Gere.

Ron Howard.

	That was little Richie Cunningham behind the camera on that one.
